  "testCases": [

    },

      "severity": "Medium",

      "title": "View System Audit Log for User Activity",
      "description": "Ensures that system actions and user activities are accurately logged and retrievable.",

      ],

      "tags": ["audit", "logging", "compliance", "system_admin"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Search for Employee Records by Partial Last Name",
      "description": "Validates the search functionality for retrieving employee records using partial text.",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",

      "title": "Attempt to Create Employee with Maximum Length First Name",
      "description": "Tests the boundary condition for the 'First Name' field, ensuring it handles the maximum allowed character limit without errors.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "HR Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",

        "Enter 'boundary.test@democustomer.com' in the 'Work Email' field",
        "Select 'Hourly Employee' from the 'Employee Type' dropdown",
        "Enter '2023-05-01' in the 'Hire Date' field",
        "Click the 'Save Employee' button",
        "Verify a success message 'Employee profile created successfully.' is displayed",
        "Verify the new employee profile displays the full 50-character first name correctly"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The employee profile is created successfully with the maximum length first name, without truncation or error.",
      "tags": ["boundary_conditions", "data_entry", "character_limits", "hr"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Attempt SQL Injection in Employee Search Field",
      "description": "Tests the system's resilience against SQL injection attempts through input fields.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "System Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",

        "Click the 'Search' button",
        "Verify that an error message like 'Invalid search query' or 'Forbidden characters detected' is displayed",
        "Verify no unauthorized data or all data is displayed (indicating a vulnerability)"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system detects and rejects the SQL injection attempt, displaying an appropriate error message without exposing data or crashing.",
      "tags": ["security_vulnerability", "invalid_inputs", "injection", "data_security"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Concurrent Login Attempts Exceeding Rate Limit",
      "description": "Verifies the system's rate limiting mechanism by attempting multiple rapid login failures from the same IP.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "Other",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/login",
        "Enter 'invalid@democustomer.com' in 'Email Address' field",
        "Enter 'wrongpassword' in 'Password' field",
        "Click 'Sign In' button (Repeat 5 times rapidly, assuming 5 is the rate limit)",
        "Verify 'Invalid credentials. Please try again.' for attempts 1-4",
        "Verify for the 5th attempt, a message 'Too many login attempts. Please try again in 5 minutes.' is displayed",
        "Attempt to log in successfully with valid credentials after the block",
        "Verify login is blocked and cannot proceed until the lockout period expires"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system enforces a rate limit on login attempts, blocking further attempts after a threshold and preventing login until the lockout period ends.",
      "tags": ["system_limits", "security", "denial_of_service", "rate_limiting"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Submit New Employee Form with Mandatory Fields Empty",
      "description": "Tests the system's error handling when mandatory fields are left blank during new employee creation.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "HR Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Click the 'Add New Employee' button",
        "Leave 'First Name' field empty",
        "Leave 'Last Name' field empty",
        "Enter 'test@democustomer.com' in the 'Work Email' field",
        "Select 'Salaried Employee' from the 'Employee Type' dropdown",
        "Enter '2024-01-01' in the 'Hire Date' field",
        "Click the 'Save Employee' button",
        "Verify validation error messages 'First Name is required.' and 'Last Name is required.' appear next to respective fields",
        "Verify the employee profile is NOT created and user remains on the 'Add New Employee' form"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system prevents submission, displays clear validation errors for all empty mandatory fields, and does not create the record.",
      "tags": ["error_handling", "invalid_inputs", "data_validation", "mandatory_fields"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Attempt to Create Duplicate Employee Work Email",
      "description": "Verifies that the system prevents the creation of employee records with duplicate unique identifiers like 'Work Email' to maintain data integrity.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "HR Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Click the 'Add New Employee' button",
        "Enter 'Duplicate' in the 'First Name' field",
        "Enter 'User' in the 'Last Name' field",
        "Enter 'jane.doe@democustomer.com' in the 'Work Email' field (assuming this email already exists from a previous test)",
        "Select 'Hourly Employee' from the 'Employee Type' dropdown",
        "Enter '2024-02-01' in the 'Hire Date' field",
        "Click the 'Save Employee' button",
        "Verify an error message 'Work Email already exists. Please use a unique email.' is displayed",
        "Verify the new employee profile is NOT created"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system prevents the creation of a duplicate employee record based on 'Work Email' and provides a clear error message.",
      "tags": ["data_integrity", "duplicate_data", "validation", "unique_constraint"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Session Timeout During Long Data Entry Form",
      "description": "Tests how the system handles a session expiring while a user is actively filling out a complex form.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "Salaried Employee",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'valid_user@democustomer.com'",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/long-form/new",
        "Start entering data into several fields on the form (e.g., 'Project Name': 'Long Term Project', 'Description': 'This is a very long description')",
        "Wait for the session timeout period (e.g., 15 minutes) without any further interaction with the system",
        "Attempt to click the 'Save Draft' button or 'Submit' button on the form",
        "Verify redirection to the login page (https://app.clause2case.com/login)",
        "Verify a message 'Your session has expired. Please log in again.' is displayed"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Upon attempting to interact with the system after session expiration, the user is redirected to the login page with an appropriate session timeout message, and data is lost.",
      "tags": ["workflow_interruption", "session_management", "usability", "data_loss_risk"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Verify Password Complexity Policy Enforcement",
      "description": "Ensures that the system strictly enforces the defined password complexity rules during password reset or creation.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Salaried Employee",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/profile/change-password",
        "Enter 'CurrentPassword123!' in the 'Current Password' field",
        "Enter 'weakpass' in the 'New Password' field (does not meet complexity)",
        "Enter 'weakpass' in the 'Confirm New Password' field",
        "Click the 'Change Password' button",
        "Verify an error message 'Password must be at least 12 characters long, include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.' is displayed",
        "Enter 'NewStrongP@ss123' in the 'New Password' field",
        "Enter 'NewStrongP@ss123' in the 'Confirm New Password' field",
        "Click the 'Change Password' button",
        "Verify a success message 'Password changed successfully.' is displayed"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system rejects weak passwords with a specific error message and allows strong, compliant passwords to be set successfully.",
      "tags": ["security", "compliance", "password_policy", "authentication"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Attempt Unauthorized Access to HR Admin Page by Non-HR User",
      "description": "Tests Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) by verifying that a non-authorized user cannot access restricted administrative pages.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Salaried Employee",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'valid_user@democustomer.com' (a standard salaried employee)",
        "Attempt to directly navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/hr-settings (an HR Admin only page)",
        "Verify redirection to the 'Dashboard' or a 'Access Denied' page (e.g., https://app.clause2case.com/access-denied)",
        "Verify an error message 'You do not have permission to access this resource.' is displayed",
        "Verify no HR settings or data are visible to the non-HR user"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The non-HR user is blocked from accessing the HR Admin page, redirected, and an 'Access Denied' message is displayed.",
      "tags": ["rbac", "security", "authorization", "compliance"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Data Masking Verification for Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in Reports",
      "description": "Ensures that sensitive PII fields are appropriately masked or redacted when displayed to users without full authorization.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Hourly Manager",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'hourly_manager@democustomer.com'",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/reports/employee-details",
        "Generate a report for 'All Employees' within their department",
        "Verify that 'Social Security Number' (SSN) field is displayed as '***-**-XXXX' or completely redacted",
        "Verify that 'Bank Account Number' field is displayed as 'XXXXXXXXXXXX1234' or completely redacted",
        "Verify that 'Date of Birth' field is displayed in full (assuming this is not considered PII for this role)"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Sensitive PII fields like SSN and Bank Account Number are masked or redacted in the report for an Hourly Manager, while non-sensitive fields are fully visible.",
      "tags": ["data_privacy", "gdpr", "compliance", "data_masking", "pii"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Verify Data Archival Policy for Old Records",
      "description": "Tests the automated archival process to ensure old, inactive data is moved according to retention policies.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Low",
      "persona": "System Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/data-retention",
        "Review the 'Archival Policy' settings for 'Inactive Employee Records' (e.g., 'Archive after 7 years of inactivity')",
        "Identify a test employee record 'Archived Employee' that was made inactive 8 years ago (pre-condition)",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Search for 'Archived Employee' in the active employee list",
        "Verify 'Archived Employee' does NOT appear in the active employee list",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/archives/employees",
        "Search for 'Archived Employee' in the archived employee list",
        "Verify 'Archived Employee' IS present in the archived list with a status of 'Archived'"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "An inactive employee record older than the archival policy is correctly moved from the active list to the archived data store, adhering to data retention policies.",
      "tags": ["data_retention", "compliance", "data_lifecycle", "archival"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Successful Integration with External Payment Gateway (Stripe)",
      "description": "Validates the end-to-end process of making a payment through an integrated third-party payment gateway.",
      "category": "integration",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Payroll Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'payroll_admin@democustomer.com'",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/payroll/payments/new",
        "Select 'Vendor Payment' as the payment type",
        "Select 'Supplier A' from 'Recipient' dropdown",
        "Enter '1500.00' in the 'Amount' field",
        "Select 'Stripe' as the 'Payment Gateway'",
        "Click 'Initiate Payment' button",
        "Verify redirection to Stripe's hosted payment page (URL contains 'stripe.com')",
        "Enter '4242' (repeat 4 times for test card) in the 'Card Number' field",
        "Enter '12/26' in the 'Expiry Date' field",
        "Enter '123' in the 'CVC' field",
        "Click the 'Pay' button on the Stripe page",
        "Verify redirection back to https://app.clause2case.com/payroll/payments/confirmation",
        "Verify a success message 'Payment processed successfully. Transaction ID: STRIPE-ABC123XYZ' is displayed"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Payment is successfully processed through Stripe, and the system confirms the transaction with a unique ID.",
      "tags": ["payment_gateway", "external_service", "api_integration", "finance"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Integration Failure: External HR System Data Sync Timeout",
      "description": "Tests the system's resilience and error handling when a scheduled data synchronization with an external HR system fails due to a timeout.",
      "category": "integration",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "System Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Pre-condition: Configure external HR system (e.g., Workday) integration to point to a mock service that introduces a 60-second delay (simulating timeout).",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/integrations/hr-sync",
        "Click the 'Manually Sync HR Data' button",
        "Monitor the system's background task or integration log for the sync process",
        "Wait for the expected timeout duration (e.g., 30 seconds configured for the system)",
        "Verify an error message 'HR Data Sync Failed: External service timed out after 30 seconds.' is displayed in the UI",
        "Verify an entry in the system's error log with 'IntegrationTimeoutException' or similar",
        "Verify no new employee data from the external system was synchronized into Clause2Case"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The HR data synchronization process fails gracefully due to timeout, an error message is displayed in the UI, an error is logged, and no partial data is imported.",
      "tags": ["integration_failure", "api_timeout", "data_sync", "error_handling"]
    }
  ]
}
```

      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/expenses/new",
        "Enter 'Business Travel - January' in the 'Expense Report Title' field",
        "Select 'Travel' from the 'Category' dropdown",
        "Click 'Add Item' button",
        "Enter 'Flight Ticket' in 'Item Description 1'",
        "Enter '550.00' in 'Amount 1'",
        "Select '2024-01-10' in 'Date 1'",
        "Click 'Add Item' button",
        "Enter 'Hotel Stay' in 'Item Description 2'",
        "Enter '300.00' in 'Amount 2'",
        "Select '2024-01-12' in 'Date 2'",
        "Click 'Submit Report' button",
        "Verify a success message 'Expense Report submitted successfully. Reference: EXP-00123' is displayed",
        "Verify the submitted report appears in 'My Expense Reports' with 'Pending Approval' status."
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Expense report with multiple items is submitted successfully, a reference ID is provided, and its status is 'Pending Approval'.",
      "tags": ["expense_management", "workflow", "data_entry", "employee_self_service"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Approve a Pending Timesheet as a Manager",
      "description": "Verifies the manager's ability to approve a submitted timesheet, changing its status.",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "Salaried Manager",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/login",
        "Enter 'manager@democustomer.com' in the 'Email Address' field",
        "Enter 'ManagerPass123!' in the 'Password' field",
        "Click the 'Sign In' button",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/approvals/timesheets",
        "Locate the timesheet for 'Hourly Employee One' for 'Week 1, January 2024' with 'Pending' status",
        "Click the 'Approve' button associated with that timesheet",
        "Verify a success message 'Timesheet approved successfully.' is displayed",
        "Verify the timesheet status for 'Hourly Employee One' changes from 'Pending' to 'Approved'"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Timesheet is successfully approved by the manager, and its status updates to 'Approved'.",
      "tags": ["workflow", "approval", "time_tracking", "management"]
    },
    {
      "title": "View System Audit Log for User Activity",
      "description": "Ensures that system actions and user activities are accurately logged and retrievable.",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Low",
      "persona": "System Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/audit-log",
        "Select 'User Login' from the 'Activity Type' filter",
        "Enter '2024-01-01' in 'Start Date' and '2024-01-31' in 'End Date'",
        "Click the 'Apply Filters' button",
        "Verify that entries for user logins within January 2024 are displayed",
        "Verify each entry includes 'Timestamp', 'User ID', 'Activity Type', and 'IP Address'"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The audit log displays filtered user login activities for January 2024, with all expected details.",
      "tags": ["audit", "logging", "compliance", "system_admin"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Search for Employee Records by Partial Last Name",
      "description": "Validates the search functionality for retrieving employee records using partial text.",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "HR Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Enter 'Doe' in the 'Search Employees' field",
        "Click the 'Search' button",
        "Verify 'Jane Doe' and any other employees with 'Doe' in their last name are displayed in the results",
        "Verify the total count of results matches the expected number of 'Doe' employees"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Search results accurately display all employees whose last name contains 'Doe', with correct count.",
      "tags": ["search", "data_retrieval", "hr", "filtering"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Attempt to Create Employee with Maximum Length First Name",
      "description": "Tests the boundary condition for the 'First Name' field, ensuring it handles the maximum allowed character limit without errors.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "HR Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Click the 'Add New Employee' button",
        "Enter 'A'.repeat(50) in the 'First Name' field (assuming max 50 chars)",
        "Enter 'Boundary' in the 'Last Name' field",
        "Enter 'boundary.test@democustomer.com' in the 'Work Email' field",
        "Select 'Hourly Employee' from the 'Employee Type' dropdown",
        "Enter '2023-05-01' in the 'Hire Date' field",
        "Click the 'Save Employee' button",
        "Verify a success message 'Employee profile created successfully.' is displayed",
        "Verify the new employee profile displays the full 50-character first name correctly"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The employee profile is created successfully with the maximum length first name, without truncation or error.",
      "tags": ["boundary_conditions", "data_entry", "character_limits", "hr"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Attempt SQL Injection in Employee Search Field",
      "description": "Tests the system's resilience against SQL injection attempts through input fields.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "System Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Enter \"' OR '1'='1 --\" in the 'Search Employees' field",
        "Click the 'Search' button",
        "Verify that an error message like 'Invalid search query' or 'Forbidden characters detected' is displayed",
        "Verify no unauthorized data or all data is displayed (indicating a vulnerability)"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system detects and rejects the SQL injection attempt, displaying an appropriate error message without exposing data or crashing.",
      "tags": ["security_vulnerability", "invalid_inputs", "injection", "data_security"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Concurrent Login Attempts Exceeding Rate Limit",
      "description": "Verifies the system's rate limiting mechanism by attempting multiple rapid login failures from the same IP.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "Other",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/login",
        "Enter 'invalid@democustomer.com' in 'Email Address' field",
        "Enter 'wrongpassword' in 'Password' field",
        "Click 'Sign In' button (Repeat 5 times rapidly, assuming 5 is the rate limit)",
        "Verify 'Invalid credentials. Please try again.' for attempts 1-4",
        "Verify for the 5th attempt, a message 'Too many login attempts. Please try again in 5 minutes.' is displayed",
        "Attempt to log in successfully with valid credentials after the block",
        "Verify login is blocked and cannot proceed until the lockout period expires"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system enforces a rate limit on login attempts, blocking further attempts after a threshold and preventing login until the lockout period ends.",
      "tags": ["system_limits", "security", "denial_of_service", "rate_limiting"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Submit New Employee Form with Mandatory Fields Empty",
      "description": "Tests the system's error handling when mandatory fields are left blank during new employee creation.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "HR Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Click the 'Add New Employee' button",
        "Leave 'First Name' field empty",
        "Leave 'Last Name' field empty",
        "Enter 'test@democustomer.com' in the 'Work Email' field",
        "Select 'Salaried Employee' from the 'Employee Type' dropdown",
        "Enter '2024-01-01' in the 'Hire Date' field",
        "Click the 'Save Employee' button",
        "Verify validation error messages 'First Name is required.' and 'Last Name is required.' appear next to respective fields",
        "Verify the employee profile is NOT created and user remains on the 'Add New Employee' form"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system prevents submission, displays clear validation errors for all empty mandatory fields, and does not create the record.",
      "tags": ["error_handling", "invalid_inputs", "data_validation", "mandatory_fields"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Attempt to Create Duplicate Employee Work Email",
      "description": "Verifies that the system prevents the creation of employee records with duplicate unique identifiers like 'Work Email' to maintain data integrity.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "HR Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Click the 'Add New Employee' button",
        "Enter 'Duplicate' in the 'First Name' field",
        "Enter 'User' in the 'Last Name' field",
        "Enter 'jane.doe@democustomer.com' in the 'Work Email' field (assuming this email already exists from a previous test)",
        "Select 'Hourly Employee' from the 'Employee Type' dropdown",
        "Enter '2024-02-01' in the 'Hire Date' field",
        "Click the 'Save Employee' button",
        "Verify an error message 'Work Email already exists. Please use a unique email.' is displayed",
        "Verify the new employee profile is NOT created"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system prevents the creation of a duplicate employee record based on 'Work Email' and provides a clear error message.",
      "tags": ["data_integrity", "duplicate_data", "validation", "unique_constraint"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Session Timeout During Long Data Entry Form",
      "description": "Tests how the system handles a session expiring while a user is actively filling out a complex form.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "Salaried Employee",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'valid_user@democustomer.com'",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/long-form/new",
        "Start entering data into several fields on the form (e.g., 'Project Name': 'Long Term Project', 'Description': 'This is a very long description')",
        "Wait for the session timeout period (e.g., 15 minutes) without any further interaction with the system",
        "Attempt to click the 'Save Draft' button or 'Submit' button on the form",
        "Verify redirection to the login page (https://app.clause2case.com/login)",
        "Verify a message 'Your session has expired. Please log in again.' is displayed"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Upon attempting to interact with the system after session expiration, the user is redirected to the login page with an appropriate session timeout message, and data is lost.",
      "tags": ["workflow_interruption", "session_management", "usability", "data_loss_risk"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Verify Password Complexity Policy Enforcement",
      "description": "Ensures that the system strictly enforces the defined password complexity rules during password reset or creation.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Salaried Employee",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/profile/change-password",
        "Enter 'CurrentPassword123!' in the 'Current Password' field",
        "Enter 'weakpass' in the 'New Password' field (does not meet complexity)",
        "Enter 'weakpass' in the 'Confirm New Password' field",
        "Click the 'Change Password' button",
        "Verify an error message 'Password must be at least 12 characters long, include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.' is displayed",
        "Enter 'NewStrongP@ss123' in the 'New Password' field",
        "Enter 'NewStrongP@ss123' in the 'Confirm New Password' field",
        "Click the 'Change Password' button",
        "Verify a success message 'Password changed successfully.' is displayed"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The system rejects weak passwords with a specific error message and allows strong, compliant passwords to be set successfully.",
      "tags": ["security", "compliance", "password_policy", "authentication"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Attempt Unauthorized Access to HR Admin Page by Non-HR User",
      "description": "Tests Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) by verifying that a non-authorized user cannot access restricted administrative pages.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Salaried Employee",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'valid_user@democustomer.com' (a standard salaried employee)",
        "Attempt to directly navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/hr-settings (an HR Admin only page)",
        "Verify redirection to the 'Dashboard' or a 'Access Denied' page (e.g., https://app.clause2case.com/access-denied)",
        "Verify an error message 'You do not have permission to access this resource.' is displayed",
        "Verify no HR settings or data are visible to the non-HR user"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The non-HR user is blocked from accessing the HR Admin page, redirected, and an 'Access Denied' message is displayed.",
      "tags": ["rbac", "security", "authorization", "compliance"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Data Masking Verification for Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in Reports",
      "description": "Ensures that sensitive PII fields are appropriately masked or redacted when displayed to users without full authorization.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Hourly Manager",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'hourly_manager@democustomer.com'",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/reports/employee-details",
        "Generate a report for 'All Employees' within their department",
        "Verify that 'Social Security Number' (SSN) field is displayed as '***-**-XXXX' or completely redacted",
        "Verify that 'Bank Account Number' field is displayed as 'XXXXXXXXXXXX1234' or completely redacted",
        "Verify that 'Date of Birth' field is displayed in full (assuming this is not considered PII for this role)"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Sensitive PII fields like SSN and Bank Account Number are masked or redacted in the report for an Hourly Manager, while non-sensitive fields are fully visible.",
      "tags": ["data_privacy", "gdpr", "compliance", "data_masking", "pii"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Verify Data Archival Policy for Old Records",
      "description": "Tests the automated archival process to ensure old, inactive data is moved according to retention policies.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "medium",
      "severity": "Low",
      "persona": "System Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/data-retention",
        "Review the 'Archival Policy' settings for 'Inactive Employee Records' (e.g., 'Archive after 7 years of inactivity')",
        "Identify a test employee record 'Archived Employee' that was made inactive 8 years ago (pre-condition)",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/employees",
        "Search for 'Archived Employee' in the active employee list",
        "Verify 'Archived Employee' does NOT appear in the active employee list",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/archives/employees",
        "Search for 'Archived Employee' in the archived employee list",
        "Verify 'Archived Employee' IS present in the archived list with a status of 'Archived'"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "An inactive employee record older than the archival policy is correctly moved from the active list to the archived data store, adhering to data retention policies.",
      "tags": ["data_retention", "compliance", "data_lifecycle", "archival"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Successful Integration with External Payment Gateway (Stripe)",
      "description": "Validates the end-to-end process of making a payment through an integrated third-party payment gateway.",
      "category": "integration",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "Payroll Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Log in as 'payroll_admin@democustomer.com'",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/payroll/payments/new",
        "Select 'Vendor Payment' as the payment type",
        "Select 'Supplier A' from 'Recipient' dropdown",
        "Enter '1500.00' in the 'Amount' field",
        "Select 'Stripe' as the 'Payment Gateway'",
        "Click 'Initiate Payment' button",
        "Verify redirection to Stripe's hosted payment page (URL contains 'stripe.com')",
        "Enter '4242' (repeat 4 times for test card) in the 'Card Number' field",
        "Enter '12/26' in the 'Expiry Date' field",
        "Enter '123' in the 'CVC' field",
        "Click the 'Pay' button on the Stripe page",
        "Verify redirection back to https://app.clause2case.com/payroll/payments/confirmation",
        "Verify a success message 'Payment processed successfully. Transaction ID: STRIPE-ABC123XYZ' is displayed"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Payment is successfully processed through Stripe, and the system confirms the transaction with a unique ID.",
      "tags": ["payment_gateway", "external_service", "api_integration", "finance"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Integration Failure: External HR System Data Sync Timeout",
      "description": "Tests the system's resilience and error handling when a scheduled data synchronization with an external HR system fails due to a timeout.",
      "category": "integration",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "High",
      "persona": "System Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Pre-condition: Configure external HR system (e.g., Workday) integration to point to a mock service that introduces a 60-second delay (simulating timeout).",
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/admin/integrations/hr-sync",
        "Click the 'Manually Sync HR Data' button",
        "Monitor the system's background task or integration log for the sync process",
        "Wait for the expected timeout duration (e.g., 30 seconds configured for the system)",
        "Verify an error message 'HR Data Sync Failed: External service timed out after 30 seconds.' is displayed in the UI",
        "Verify an entry in the system's error log with 'IntegrationTimeoutException' or similar",
        "Verify no new employee data from the external system was synchronized into Clause2Case"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The HR data synchronization process fails gracefully due to timeout, an error message is displayed in the UI, an error is logged, and no partial data is imported.",
      "tags": ["integration_failure", "api_timeout", "data_sync", "error_handling"]
    }
  ]
}
```

{
  "testCases": [

      "category": "functional",

      "persona": "HR Admin",

        "Click the 'Edit Profile' button",
        "Update 'jane.doe@democustomer.com' to 'jane.newemail@democustomer.com' in the 'Work Email' field",
        "Enter '555-123-4567' in the 'Phone Number' field",
        "Click the 'Save Changes' button",
        "Verify a success message 'Employee profile updated successfully.' is displayed",
        "Verify 'jane.newemail@democustomer.com' and '555-123-4567' are displayed on Jane Doe's profile page"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Employee's contact information is updated successfully, and changes are reflected on the profile page.",
      "tags": ["user_management", "update", "hr", "data_modification"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Generate Monthly Payroll Summary Report",
      "description": "Verifies the system's ability to generate a standard report based on specified criteria.",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "high",
      "severity": "Medium",
      "persona": "Payroll Admin",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to https://app.clause2case.com/reports/payroll",
        "Select 'Monthly Payroll Summary' from the 'Report Type' dropdown",
        "Select 'January 2024' from the 'Reporting Period' dropdown",
        "Click the 'Generate Report' button",
        "Verify the report is displayed on the screen within 10 seconds",
        "Verify the report title is 'Monthly Payroll Summary - January 2024'",
        "Verify the report contains columns 'Employee Name', 'Gross Pay', 'Net Pay', 'Taxes Withheld'"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The Monthly Payroll Summary Report for January 2024 is generated and displayed with correct data and format.",
      "tags": ["reporting", "payroll", "data_retrieval", "finance"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Submit an Expense Report with Multiple Items",

        "Verify the submitted report appears in 'My Expense Reports' with 'Pending Approval' status."
      ],

    },

        "Verify the new employee profile displays the full 50-character first name correctly"
